title: Who are the NFL's best running backs? Execs, coaches and scouts help rank 2025's top 10
content: Execs, coaches, scouts and players from around the league ranked their top 10 in our annual summer series.

title: Banchero, Magic agree to $239M rookie max deal
content: Magic star Paolo Banchero has agreed to a five-year, $239 million maximum rookie contract extension that could reach $287 million, his agent told ESPN.

title: Pacers confirm Haliburton won't play next season
content: The Indiana Pacers confirmed what was expected: that star point guard Tyrese Haliburton will miss the entire 2025-26 season after surgery to repair a torn right Achilles tendon.

title: Brown brings 'championship pedigree' to Knicks
content: The Knicks officially hired Mike Brown as their head coach, turning to the two-time NBA Coach of the Year after firing Tom Thibodeau.

title: Ball excited about 'great situation' with Cavaliers
content: Lonzo Ball doesn't have to worry about rehabbing from a knee injury for the first time in a couple of seasons and is excited about his offseason trade to the Cleveland Cavaliers.

title: Padres slugger Machado gets 2,000th career hit
content: Manny Machado of the San Diego Padres got his 2,000th career hit Monday night against the Arizona Diamondbacks.

title: Elder Chavez defends son arrested by ICE agents
content: Former world champ Julio Cesar Chavez is set to defend his same-name son, who was arrested by U.S. immigration agents at his Los Angeles home for overstaying his visa and lying on a green card application.

title: Sources: Bonner expected to return to Mercury
content: WNBA vet DeWanna Bonner, recently waived by the Fever, is expected to sign with the Mercury, sources said, rejoining the franchise with which she won two titles.

title: Kershaw: ASG legend nod 'weird, but it's cool'
content: Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw spoke to reporters on Monday, a day after his 11th career All-Star Game selection, but the three-time Cy Young Award winner said being the "Legend Pick" was "weird, but it's cool, so I'm just going to enjoy it."

content: Carroll's competitive nature and fun-loving spirit is palpable, and the Raiders are hoping their new approach will translate to wins.

content: There were plenty of difficult lessons for the USMNT in the Gold Cup final loss to Mexico on Sunday. How Mauricio Pochettino & Co. respond will be telling.

content: Spain produced a scintillating second half performance to romp to a 6-2 victory over Belgium. Here's what else you need to know from Euro 2025 action.

title: Running back rankings: Who are the most reliable TD scorers?
content: From Jahmyr Gibbs and Derrick Henry to Bijan Robinson, we rank the running backs based on the most dependable at finding the end zone.

title: Sources: Arsenal closing in on $76M Gy√∂keres deal
content: Arsenal are close to sealing a move for Sporting Lisbon forward Viktor Gy√∂keres, sources have told ESPN.

title: Poch: USMNT Gold Cup lessons 'priceless, painful'
content: United States coach Maurico Pochettino said his team had learned "priceless" lessons despite a "painful" 2-1 loss to rival Mexico during Sunday's Gold Cup final.

title: Sources: Atl√©tico, Miami in talks over De Paul
content: Inter Miami is holding talks with Atl√©tico Madrid to sign Rodrigo De Paul, sources confirmed with ESPN.

title: Fluminense want 'game of chess' in Chelsea semi
content: Fluminense are relishing their role as the Club World Cup's underdogs ahead of Tuesday's semi-final against Chelsea, with manager Renato Gaucho embracing an "us against the world" mentality that has carried the Brazilian side to an improbable run.

title: Putellas nets 2 as Spain trounce Belgium at Euros
content: Striker Alexia Putellas scored twice for world champions Spain as they shook off a slow start to beat Belgium 6-2 in their Women's Euros Group B clash on Monday.

title: USWNT's Yohannes completes Lyonnes deal
content: United States women's national team midfielder Lily Yohannes has signed a three-year contract with French powerhouse OL Lyonnes, the club announced on Monday.

title: Source: Liverpool to begin preseason on Tuesday
content: Liverpool players are set to report for preseason training on Tuesday, following the death of forward Diogo Jota, a source told ESPN.

title: Maresca: Madueke can play amid transfer 'noise'
content: Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca has said Noni Madueke remains available to play at the Club World Cup despite the club holding talks over a potential move to London rivals Arsenal.

title: MLS Power Rankings: As Vancouver slips, Nashville is new No. 1
content: Injury-hit Vancouver fell to the Galaxy, leaving the door open for Nashville to take top spot in ESPN's MLS Power Rankings.

title: The four biggest lessons of free agency's first wave
content: Why did so many players simply re-sign instead of exploring the market? Here are 2025's hottest hockey trends.

title: 'I never doubted him': F1 celebrates Nico H√ºlkenberg's long-overdue first podium
content: In a 15-year F1 career, Nico H√ºlkenberg had never tasted podium champagne. That changed at Silverstone, an achievement celebrated up and down pit lane.

title: Remembering Ruffian 50 years after her breakdown at Belmont
content: The filly shattered her right front ankle in a match race against Kentucky Derby winner Foolish Pleasure.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona told price to sign Rafael Le√£o
content: Barcelona have been told what they will need to pay to sign Rafael Le√£o from AC Milan. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

content: The summer transfer window is now open, but what are our reporters hearing about deals that could be done?

title: Waiver wire: Brewers ace finally returns to the mound
content: Tristan H. Cockcroft outlines the players you should be claiming off the waiver wire, including a returning one-time Cy Young contender.

title: What to expect from Norman Powell, John Collins
content: Andre Snellings and Eric Moody break down all off the trades and signings of the offseason in the NBA, including Norman Powell and John Collins on the move.

title: Saniya Rivers, Aziaha James set to produce
content: Saniya Rivers' emergence for the Sun and Aziaha James' ascent to a prominent starting role on the Wings highlight the top pickups of the week.

title: Thane: MNS workers detained ahead of rally; CM Fadnavis says 'must take permission'
content: Maharashtra CM Devendra Fadnavis criticized MNS for defying police instructions regarding their Thane rally, planned amidst tensions following an assault on a food stall owner for allegedly not speaking Marathi. Fadnavis emphasized the importance of coordinating with authorities for rally routes, citing traffic concerns and the need for permission in a democratic state.

title: 'Deport them all': Briton fumes at Indian staff at UK airport for not speaking English
content: Lucy White, a Cambridge alumna, ignited outrage with a xenophobic rant on X, criticizing the prevalence of Indian and Asian staff at Heathrow Airport. She alleged they didn't speak English and demanded their deportation, sparking widespread condemnation online.

title: Businessman Gopal Khemka murder: Accused killed in police encounter in Bihar
content: Bihar Police fatally shot an accused individual involved in the murder of Gopal Khemka, claiming self-defense after the accused allegedly attacked them. This incident follows the arrest of two individuals, including the alleged shooter, in connection with the industrialist's murder in Patna.

title: UP shocker: Man spits on woman pilgrim‚Äôs 'kanwar' in Muzaffarnagar
content: In Purkazi, Muzaffarnagar, a man named Usman was arrested for allegedly spitting on a woman devotee's kanwar during the Kanwar Yatra. The incident occurred while the woman was resting with holy Ganga water from Haridwar.

title: Rocket shocker: US Air Force halts SpaceX project; Reason same as why Musk skipped omelette ‚Ä¶
content: The U.S. Air Force has suspended its plan to collaborate with SpaceX for hypersonic rocket cargo deliveries from Johnston Atoll due to environmental concerns. Biologists and experts feared the project would endanger numerous seabirds nesting on the remote Pacific wildlife refuge.

title: Yash Dayal accused of sexual exploitation, physical violence; FIR registered
content: Indian cricketer Yash Dayal faces serious allegations from a Ghaziabad woman, including sexual exploitation, physical violence, and cheating under false pretenses of marriage. Booked under Section 69 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita, Dayal is accused of a five-year-long deception. The complainant claims Dayal introduced her to his family, deepening her trust, before subjecting her to abuse and financial exploitation.

title: Marathi row: MNS leader Avinash Jadhav detained ahead of rally
content: Tensions flared in Mira Bhayander as MNS leader Avinash Jadhav was detained ahead of a planned rally countering protests against MNS activists assaulting a food stall owner for not speaking Marathi. Police denied permission for a Maharashtra Ekikaran Samiti rally and increased security, citing potential law and order issues due to Jadhav's presence and his history of registered offenses.

title: Madhya Pradesh: Wall of homestay near Bageshwar Dham collapses; 1 dead
content: A homestay collapsed near Bageshwar Dham in Chattarpur district. The tragic incident occurred early Tuesday. One woman, Anita Devi, died in the collapse. Ten other individuals sustained injuries. Three of the injured are in critical condition. Heavy overnight rain caused the wall of the homestay in Gada village to collapse. Injured individuals were taken to the district hospital for treatment.

title: Bill Gates out of world‚Äôs 10 richest man list; net worth falls 30% in 7 days
content: Bill Gates has fallen out of the top ten richest people due to a recalculation reflecting his significant charitable donations. His net worth decreased by $52 billion, moving him to twelfth place, while Steve Ballmer, his former assistant and Microsoft's ex-CEO, now ranks higher with $172 billion.

title: Gold price prediction today: Where are gold rates headed? Trump's tariff add uncertainty
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are expected to fluctuate within a range, influenced by trade deal developments. Despite tariff deadline extensions, gold retains safe-haven appeal amid ongoing trade tensions. Experts advise monitoring trade deal movements for a clearer outlook.

title: Bharat Bandh on July 9: Over 25 crore workers to join nationwide strike, key services may be hit
content: Over 25 crore workers across India are set to strike, potentially disrupting banking, mining, and transport services. Trade unions are protesting government policies they deem anti-worker and pro-corporate, citing concerns over labor codes, privatization, and unemployment. Farmers and agricultural workers are also expected to join the nationwide demonstration against the government.

title: Infosys HR sends 'detailed warning email' to employees: We must work‚Ä¶.
content: Infosys is sending personalized warnings to employees exceeding standard work hours, a move contrasting founder Narayana Murthy's call for a 70-hour workweek. The company's automated system tracks remote work, alerting employees working beyond 9 hours and 15 minutes daily. This policy shift prioritizes employee well-being and work-life balance amidst health concerns in the IT sector.

title: IND vs ENG | Trauma & triumph: Ailing sister hails Akash Deep‚Äôs heroics
content: Akash Deep's remarkable 10-wicket haul against England was made even more poignant by the revelation of his sister's battle with stage three colon cancer. Akhand Jyoti Singh, diagnosed in April 2025, shared how Akash supported her during her treatment while playing in the IPL.

title: 'We don't want an emperor,' Lula slams Trump tariffs, hints dollar shift
content: Brazilian President Lula da Silva criticized Donald Trump's tariff threats against the Brics nations, asserting the world desires alternatives to American dominance. Trump's warning of a 10% tariff if the bloc adopts "anti-American" positions sparked resistance. Brics members expressed concerns about rising tariffs and emphasized cooperation, while downplaying ambitions for a common currency amid the trade tensions.

title: 'Maharashtra for all': MNS leader‚Äôs son hit my SUV twice, claims Mumbai influencer
content: Rajshree More, a social media influencer, has accused Rahil Javed Shaikh, son of an MNS functionary, of ramming her car while intoxicated in Andheri West. Shaikh allegedly hurled abuses, invoked his political connections, and was later booked for rash driving, intimidation, and drunk driving.

title: "He got tired of that BBL smell": Cardi B deletes Stefon Diggs pics; fans slam rapper
content: Cardi B has sparked breakup rumors with Stefon Diggs by deleting all their photos together from her Instagram. Just weeks after their romantic getaways, including a stay in a French castle, fans noticed the sudden disappearance of Diggs from her social media. A cryptic post from Paris further fueled speculation, leaving fans wondering if the whirlwind romance is over.

title: Colin Kaepernick: 'I'm not quitting'‚Äîdaily training for NFL comeback
content: Colin Kaepernick, now 37, declares his readiness to return to the NFL after an eight-year absence. Despite last playing in 2017, he maintains a rigorous training schedule and believes he can still be a starting quarterback. Kaepernick awaits an opportunity, remaining optimistic that the right team will call, even after years away from the game.

title: Dayton Bramhall cut again ‚Äî legacy Disney daughter‚Äôs emotional Netflix journey
content: Dayton Bramhall, daughter of Shelly, faced challenges in her DCC journey. She auditioned thrice but was cut each time. Despite her family's DCC legacy, she needed to earn her place. The rejection strained relationships, especially with her mother. Dayton now teaches at The Young Company in Texas. She empowers young dancers with her experiences.

title: When does Sawan 2025 begin: Important Somvars, date, pooja vidhi, and significance
content: Sawan, a sacred month dedicated to Lord Shiva, commences around July 11 in 2025, according to the Purnimanta calendar. Its origin lies in the Samudra Manthan, where Shiva consumed poison to save the universe. Devotees observe fasts, perform Abhishek of the Shivalinga, and chant mantras, seeking blessings for marital bliss, wish fulfillment, and spiritual growth during this auspicious time.

title: India-US trade: 'Close to making a deal with India,' says Donald Trump
content: Donald Trump announced the US is nearing a trade agreement with India, alongside deals with the UK and China. Tariff letters, outlining reciprocal rates effective August 1, 2025, were issued to various trading partners. New 25% tariffs were imposed on Japan and South Korea, with warnings of reverting to higher April rates if deals aren't finalized soon.

title: Antarctica‚Äôs hidden threat: Melting ice could spark hundreds of explosive volcanoes
content: A new study reveals a concerning link between climate change and increased volcanic activity, particularly in glaciated regions like West Antarctica. Melting ice sheets reduce pressure on magma chambers, potentially triggering more frequent and explosive eruptions. This phenomenon, observed in Chile, could unleash hidden volcanoes and create a dangerous feedback loop, accelerating global warming.

title: Why not every Indian with Rs 23 lakh can get UAE Golden Visa? Rules explained
content: The UAE Golden Visa, now accessible to Indians via a nomination-based model, offers long-term residency but isn't solely about affordability. While a ‚Çπ23.3 lakh option exists, eligibility hinges on profession, societal contributions, and economic value. Investors, entrepreneurs, talents, and students face specific criteria, including financial investments, business valuations, endorsements, or academic excellence.

title: Top stocks to buy today: Stock market recommendations - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Mirae Asset Sharekhan suggests buying Jio Finance and Varun Beverages Limited. Jio Finance is expected to break out, targeting Rs 345. Varun Beverages has broken out of a pattern, resuming its uptrend.

title: IND vs ENG: Dinesh Karthik reveals conversation with Virat Kohli, likens him with Gill
content: Dinesh Karthik revealed a conversation with Virat Kohli where Kohli stated that Test captaincy brought out his best batting. Karthik drew a parallel with Shubman Gill, who expressed a similar sentiment about prioritizing the team's needs over individual performance after becoming captain. Karthik believes Gill's captaincy mindset, combined with his skill and technique, positions him for success.

title: Sunken vessel: Kerala govt seeks Rs 9.5k cr damages
content: The Kerala government has filed a suit in the High Court, demanding the arrest of the vessel MSC Akiteta II to recover ‚Çπ9,531 crores. This compensation is for environmental and economic damage caused by the sinking of MSC Elsa 3 off the Kerala coast in May.

title: Bihar voter list revision: What it is and why it‚Äôs controversial - Explained
content: Bihar's electoral roll revision sparks political debate before upcoming elections, with opposition questioning document requirements and timing. The Election Commission aims to eliminate duplicate voters, requiring proof of residency. While Aadhaar is excluded due to illegal immigration concerns, various government-issued documents are accepted. Opposition parties argue that many lack the required documents, citing land ownership issues.

title: Defense manufacturing can drive India's rise as global power: Ram Madhav
content: Ram Madhav emphasises India's need to reorient its focus towards its neighborhood and the Global South amidst global turmoil. He advocates for prioritising technology and economic growth, aiming for 9-10% sustained growth, and capitalising on defense manufacturing. Madhav also highlights the importance of 'Brand Bharat,' promoting Indian values like democracy and consensus-driven governance, or 'dharmocracy,' on the global stage.

title: On horseback, heavily armed: Feds storm LA‚Äôs MacArthur Park, find it empty
content: Dozens of heavily armed federal officers and nearly 90 National Guard troops descended on Los Angeles‚Äô MacArthur Park, sparking outrage from city officials, including Mayor Karen Bass, who likened the scene to ‚Äúa city under siege.‚Äù The operation, which involved troops on horseback and military vehicles, took place in a vibrant, immigrant-rich neighborhood.

title: Texas flash floods: Death toll surpasses 100 - Top developments
content: Catastrophic flooding in Texas over the July Fourth weekend has resulted in a death toll of 104, with search and rescue teams continuing their efforts to find missing individuals. Camp Mystic, an all-girls Christian summer camp, tragically lost 27 campers and counselors. Questions are being raised regarding weather warnings and evacuation protocols, as the community grapples with the devastation.

title: Why Travis Kelce reportedly won‚Äôt propose to Taylor Swift anytime soon?
content: Amidst public attention and professional commitments, Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's relationship is reportedly deepening, though a proposal isn't expected soon. Kelce is prioritizing his NFL career, while Swift enjoys a quieter phase after her Eras Tour. Their bond is characterized by mutual support and intimate moments, focusing on connection over grand gestures as they navigate their high-profile romance.

title: IND vs ENG: Alyssa Healy's blunt take on Gill's dream run - 'Ball not really...'
content: Alyssa Healy subtly acknowledged Shubman Gill's impressive form in the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy, suggesting the less pronounced movement of the Duke ball has aided his success. While praising Gill's technical adjustments, Brad Haddin lauded his resilience and composure as captain, especially in leading the team without key player Bumrah. Haddin highlighted Gill's ability to remain unfazed under pressure.

title: Deal in limbo: Ukraine war, sanctions cast shadow on Indo-Russian joint venture for 200 choppers
content: The Indo-Russian joint venture to manufacture Kamov helicopters in India is facing significant delays due to the Ukraine war, Western sanctions, and supply chain disruptions. HAL is awaiting certification status from the Russians before making further decisions. Consequently, HAL is shifting its focus towards indigenous helicopter platforms like LUH, LCH, and IMRH, with production centralized at the Tumakuru facility.

title: Vishnu Manchu's mythological drama Kannappa's day 11 collection sees a dip
content: Vishnu Manchu's mythological drama 'Kannappa,' featuring star cameos, has earned Rs 32.08 crore in 11 days. After a strong opening week with Rs 30.2 crore, collections dipped, with Monday's earnings at Rs 15 lakh. Despite criticism for pacing, the film's visuals, devotional climax, and cameo performances, particularly Prabhas, have been appreciated.

title: Trump releases tariff letters: Countries facing up to 40% duties from August 1
content: Donald Trump's administration has released letters to trading partners, announcing reciprocal tariffs effective August 1, 2025. Tariffs of 25% will be imposed on Japan, South Korea, Kazakhstan, and Malaysia, while Myanmar and Laos face 40%, and South Africa 30%.

title: After US arrest, terrorist Passia may soon be sent to India
content: Pro-Khalistan terrorist Harpreet Singh, alias Happy Passia, a key operative for the ISI, is expected to be extradited from the US to India soon after his arrest in California. Accused of orchestrating grenade attacks and terror activities in Punjab, Passia faces charges related to targeting law enforcement, sacred sites, and prominent figures.

title: Jackie Shroff says wife sold her house to buy him one, lived with him in a chawl
content: Jackie Shroff, known for 'Hero', faced hardship before success. He lived in a chawl and values simple things. He met Ayesha on a bus and knew he would marry her. Ayesha supported him, even selling her house. They lived in a one-room chawl after marrying in 1987. Ayesha's father trusted Jackie's intentions. Their love story is inspiring.

title: 'He‚Äôs forging peace': Netanyahu nominates Trump for Nobel Peace Prize
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu nominated Donald Trump for the Nobel Peace Prize, citing his efforts in forging peace agreements. This occurred as both leaders met to discuss ceasefire negotiations and a hostage-release deal in Gaza, with indirect talks ongoing in Qatar. Trump has expressed frustration over not previously receiving the award, despite past nominations and his self-proclaimed peacemaking efforts.

title: Shortage of surgeons & retrieval centres hinders organ transplants
content: India faces a critical shortage in organ transplants, with only a fraction of needed kidney transplants performed annually. A government review highlights underperforming transplant centers, particularly in government hospitals, despite adequate infrastructure. Recommendations include mandating organ retrieval facilities in medical colleges and incorporating transplant costs into the Ayushman Bharat scheme.

title: Plane on runway, incoming SWISS flight safely executes last-min go-around at IGIA
content: A potential collision was averted at Delhi's IGIA when an Indian carrier's A320, arriving from Phuket, slowed down and failed to promptly vacate the runway. This forced the Delhi ATC to instruct a SWISS Airbus A330, approaching from Zurich, to execute a go-around at 1,400 feet.

title: Tom Brady reveals shocking injury that almost ended his NFL career before it truly began
content: Tom Brady almost retired in 2005 due to severe elbow pain that threatened his career. The discomfort, present since childhood, made throwing unbearable. A turning point came with Alex Guerrero's pliability therapy, part of the TB12 Method, which provided immediate relief and revolutionized Brady's approach to injury prevention, extending his legendary career.

title: NRC notice to West Bengal resident: Mamata calls for Opposition unity against BJP‚Äôs divisive policies
content: In a post on ‚ÄòX‚Äô, West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee pointed out that NRC notice to Uttam Kumar Brajabasi, a Rajbanshi, resident of Dinhata in Cooch Behar for over 50 years is ‚Äúnothing short of a systematic assault on democracy‚Äù

title: Rescue operations faces further delay at Payyanamon quarry
content: While local residents have alleged that the Chenkulath quarry was operating without proper approvals, the district administration clarified that the site does have authorisation from the Department of Geology

title: Operation Sindoor: the new normal in an old story
content: Featuring articles from retired military leaders, former diplomats, and subject experts, this e-book provides a comprehensive understanding of the changed geopolitical realities in South Asia after Operation Sindoor

title: Bharat Bandh on July 9: what will be open and what‚Äôs affected?
content: A forum of 10 central trade unions and their associates has called for a general strike or ‚ÄòBharat Bandh‚Äô to ‚Äúoppose the anti-worker, anti-farmer and anti-national pro-corporate policies of the government‚Äù

title: Gyanvapi case: Varanasi court rejects plea to transfer 1991 suit to another court
content: The District Judge rejected the transfer application, stating that the petitioners were not parties to the original suit

title: DJ SixEight on the viral ‚ÄòStarboy‚Äô X ‚ÄòPraayam nammil‚Äô mix : ‚ÄòWe have not used AI in the video‚Äô
content: The video has garnered over 1.8 million views on YouTube and reintroduction of Prakash Mathew, a character from the Malayalam movie Niram, has gained attention

title: When will PM Modi breaks silence: Congress after Donald Trump repeats ‚Äòstopped India-Pak conflict‚Äô claim
content: Donald Trump has stated that India and Pakistan agreed to a ceasefire because the carrot-and-stick of trade with the U.S. was used by him, Mr. Ramesh said

title: Kerala private bus strike: Public transport hit in Ernakulam district
content: Daily commuters had a tough time as about 1, 300 private buses in the district stayed away from the roads

title: Hyderabad couple and children killed in car crash in U.S.
content: Officials from the Indian consulate are coordinating with U.S. authorities to expedite the process of bringing back the bodies, while the cause of the accident in under investigation

title: Kalaburagi district generates ‚Çπ4,416 crore in excise revenue
content: The revenue has come from liquor sale through retail outlets, bars and restaurants in the last 18 months

title: Cuddalore train-school van accident LIVE: Three children killed; gatekeeper suspended for negligence
content: Tamil Nadu CM announces ex-gratia; eyewitnesses accounts said the gatekeeper had dozed off and failed to close the gate

title: Key suspect in industrialist Gopal Khemka's murder killed in police encounter in Patna
content: Police have already arrested the gunman, identified as Umesh Rai, and detained another person who is suspected of hiring the contract killer

title: Palaniswami undertakes hour-long morning stroll interspersed with tetea-tete with co-walkers at Race Course¬†
content: The former Chief Minister promised projects to rejuvenate the industrial climate in Coimbatore and the Western region

title: Cuddalore train accident: At least three children killed as passenger train rams school van at level crossing in T.N.; gatekeeper suspended
content: The driver of the school van was attempting to cross the Railway Level Crossing Gate No. 170, between Cuddalore and Alappakkam, when the vehicle was hit by Train No. 56813 Villupuram-Mayiladuthurai passenger

title: Government hospital doctor stabbed with knife in Srivilliputtur in T.N.
content: The police said the accused shouted at the doctor over a 2019 incident at the government hospital in Srivilliputtur

title: Kolkata to get a dedicated Vietnam desk to promote trade and commerce between Bengal and Vietnam
content: Officials from Vietnam say that the strategic position of Kolkata and direct water trade routes between Kolkata and Vietnam can be a major boost for trade

title: Parents of RG Kar victim seek permission from city court for access to crime scene
content: The bereaved parents also said they will attend the ‚ÄòNabanna Abhiyan‚Äô (march to State Secretariat) protest rally on August 9, and ‚ÄòReclaim The Night‚Äô protests on August 14, marking one year of the crime and the women‚Äôs protests respectively

title: Dropped from official holiday calendar by L-G, ruling NC starts preparations for ‚ÄòMartyrs Day‚Äô in Srinagar
content: The preparations assumed significance because J&K Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha removed the ‚ÄòMartyrs Day‚Äô¬†from the official holiday calendar of the government after the Centre ended J&K‚Äôs special constitutional status in 2019.¬†

title: TMC student leader says many like rape accused Monojit Mishra present in other Kolkata colleges
content: Party leaders ask why Rajanya Halder, a suspended Trinamool Congress student leader, had not brought the accusations to the party‚Äôs notice before

title: Madhya Pradesh High Court notice to State govt. over recently notified promotion rules
content: The provisions under the new rules include 20% reservation for the ST and 16% for the SC communities, while the employees from the two communities will also be eligible for promotions based on merit.

title: Japanese Coast Guard ship arrives at Chennai for joint exercises
content: Over the course of a week-long visit, the JCGS Itsukushima will participate in official courtesy calls, reciprocal ship visits, and joint training and interactive sessions

title: Six people from West Bengal deported by Delhi Police
content: Both families have written to the Delhi Police seeking a response, and said that they shall approach the courts

title: Bengal school recruitment scam: Exclude tainted candidates from fresh recruitment process in West Bengal, says HC
content: Tainted refers to candidates who used corruption and fraud to get the jobs while untainted refers to teachers against whom there are no such allegations

title: Five members of family burnt alive in Bihar‚Äôs Purnia district on allegation of witchcraft
content: Incident took place on Sunday, July 6, night at Tetgama village under Muffasil Police station, three arrested

title: Bear that killed 3 men battered to death by angry locals in M.P.
content: Five villagers tried to chase away the bear to rescue the buffalo, which caused the animal to attack them

title: Nadda should be held accountable for NMC, PCI bribery scandal: Congress
content: ‚ÄúHow could such widespread manipulation of inspections, approvals, and biometric systems happen without tacit approval from above?‚Äù asks the party

title: ‚ÄòSafety Club‚Äô launched in educational institutes to foster student empowerment
content: Planned activities include cyber safety campaigns, anti-drug drives, mental health awareness weeks, legal awareness and rights sessions, and digital detox programmes for students and parents

title: T.N. State Planning Commission‚Äôs report shows increase in built-up area over 30 years has fuelled heat stress
content: Parts of Chennai, Karur, and Ramanathapuram are now among Tamil Nadu‚Äôs most heat-vulnerable hotspots, while even cooler regions such as Udhagamandalam and Kodaikanal have become hotter, the report says

title: Akasa Air picks Hyderabad‚Äôs GMR Aero Technic for base maintenance of its Boeing 737 MAX fleet
content: Under the agreement, GMR Aero Technic will carry out scheduled base maintenance checks at its MRO facility located within the Hyderabad airport

title: T.N. Planning Commission submits four reports to Chief Minister M.K. Stalin
content: The reports listed recommendations for land-use planning, child nutrition, thermal stress management, and nature-based solutions in Tier 2 cities

title: Siddaramaiah and D.K. Shivakumar visiting Delhi; appointments to boards and corporations likely to be discussed
content: CM to meet Rajnath Singh to seek air show during Dasara in Mysuru & DCM meeting Jal Shakthi Minister over Yettinhole issue

title: Army Chief commends Major who helped woman deliver baby at Jhansi railway station
content: The ADGPI said Major Bachwala Rohit noticed a pregnant woman in distress at the station and conducted an emergency delivery, using improvised resources, including a towel, a knife and hair clips. He also effectively handled the complications the mother developed after the delivery

title: Rampant traffic rule violations put commuters at risk
content: Motor Vehicles department takes action against 40 bus operators; over 4,000 violations, including overspeeding, reported last month

title: Maharashtra linguistic groups, actors, politicians protest over Narendra Jadhav panel
content: ‚ÄúAt least 25 organisations backed the protest, demanding resignation of the School Education Minister Dada Bhuse,‚Äù Sushil Shejule, a member of the Marathi Shala Sanstha, said

title: JioBlackRock Mutual Fund raises over ‚Çπ17,800 crore via maiden NFO
content: The fund was mobilised from three cash/debt mutual fund schemes ‚Äî JioBlackRock Overnight Fund, JioBlackRock Liquid Fund and JioBlackRock Money Market Fund

title: Schools under govt.‚Äôs free residential schooling for SC students charging fees under various pretexts
content: Social Justice Ministry warns schools, says ‚Äústrict action‚Äù will be taken through CBSE for violating guidelines

title: India will give a ‚Äònew form‚Äô to BRICS grouping in 2026: PM Modi
content: India gave priority to the issues of the Global South during leadership of G-20, and will similarly take BRICS forward in the spirit of humanity first, says PM as New Delhi prepares to take over leadership of grouping from current president Brazil

title: Bihar DGP says Gopal Khemka‚Äôs shooter will be nabbed soon; as more murders follow, Opposition, ally target Nitish government
content: DGP Vinay Kumar says over a dozen people have been detained on suspicion, and the Patna jail raids are part of the investigation as criminals might have a ‚Äòlot of information‚Äô

title: Former BJP MP questioned in road rage case
content: Anantkumar Hegde was booked for assaulting a businessman and manhandling his family members over a road-rage incident

title: Election Commission says 36.47% of enlisted voters have submitted enumeration forms for Bihar SIR
content: The names of all voters who have submitted the forms will be included in the draft Electoral Rolls to be published on August 1

title: Union Tourism Minister Shekhawat appreciates uptick in tourist footfall in Kashmir
content: He said the regular visits of Ministers and inter-Ministerial coordination meetings were helping in the revival of tourism

title: In Bihar SIR challenge, Supreme Court refers to 1977 verdict on Election Commission‚Äôs powers
content: Justice Sudhanshu Dhulia refers to the court‚Äôs observation that ‚Äòa free and fair election based on universal adult franchise is the basic‚Äô, and that powers of the EC under Article 324 must not end up creating a ‚Äòconstitutional despot‚Äô

title: Modi government is fixated on big businesses, says Jairam Ramesh
content: The Congress general secretary (communications) says concentration of resources in industry has raised prices for consumers and is one of the main sources of inflation. The Modi government is fixated on big businesses instead of betting big on small businesses, he says

title: Normalcy is returning in Manipur, says Sunil Ambekar
content: Sharing the Sangh‚Äôs plan to mark its centenary, Sunil Ambekar says the organisation is looking to reach out to every village and every house

title: 50,000 maritime sector jobs for northeast youth planned, says Sonowal
content: The Minister of Ports, Shipping, and Waterways said India‚Äôs ports are now globally competitive, with nine of them ranking in the world‚Äôs top 100

title: Over 30 crore workers, farmers will join strike against govt.‚Äôs policies, say trade unions
content: They say workers have supported the 17-point charter of demands of the strike, called against Union Government‚Äôs policies

title: House sites will be distributed to all beneficiaries in Gannavaram soon, says A.P. Energy Minister¬†
content: Calls upon the public to make the most of the schemes being implemented by the government, and enquires about the disbursement of pensions and other benefits

title: BBMP proposed to be split up into five corporations
content: The proposed five corporations have been carved out in such a way that the maximum variance in revenue generation among them is ‚Çπ100 Crore

title: Sakambari festival commences at Indrakeeladri¬†
content: Presiding deity decorated as ‚ÄòSakambari Devi‚Äô with fruit, vegetables, green leaves and flowers on the first day of the three-day festival

title: Polluting cooking fuel users may be at a higher risk of cognitive impairment finds study in Karnataka
content: The study, published in The Lancet found that users of only polluting cooking fuel, primarily rural women, had significantly lower scores in global cognition, visuospatial ability and executive functions

title: Karnataka commercial vehicle operators demand inclusion in FASTag annual toll scheme
content: The Ministry of Road Transport and Highways recently unveiled an annual FASTag pass scheme for non-commercial vehicles at a fixed cost of ‚Çπ3,000, aiming to streamline toll payments and promote digital transactions

title: Kapil Dev expresses interest in partnering with Telangana to transform sports ecosystem
content: The legendary cricketer and film actor Ajay Devgan called on Chief Minister Revanth Reddy in New Delhi on Monday

title: Drug Regulator Lists 17 Drugs You Can Flush Down Toilet If Expired
content: Think twice before tossing any outdated or expired medicines you may have at home. Flushing certain drugs down the toilet to avoid unintentionally harming people or animals is the appropriate way to get rid of them.

title: Liquor Shops On Kanwar Yatra Route To Be Covered With Curtains
content: The curbs on liquor shops will be in addition to instructions issued by the administration to dhabas and hotels along the Kanwariyas' route to mandatorily display names of owners, food licences, menu and rate lists.

title: Geography, Climate, Policy Failures: What Intensified Texas Floods
content: "There's no such thing as a natural disaster," geographers like to say -- a reminder that human choices turn hazards into tragedies.

title: Entrepreneur Turned Beauty Mogul Is South Korea's Newest Billionaire
content: APR Corp., a once-obscure Seoul-based startup is now at the center of the K-beauty boom. Behind the firm is 36-year-old Kim Byung Hoon, a tech entrepreneur-turned-beauty mogul whose company has made him South Koreas newest billionaire.

title: Growing Methi To Studying Muscle Cells: Top Biologist Lists Space Experiments
content: Axiom 4 mission sees the astronaut conduct scientific experiments that could help in future of space biology and sustainability in long-duration missions.

title: Home-Cooked Vegetarian, Non-Vegetarian Thali Costs Drop In June: Report
content: The cost of home-cooked vegetarian and non-vegetarian thalis declined 8 per cent and 6 per cent (year-on-year), respectively, in June, a report showed on Tuesday.

title: PM Modi Welcomed In Brasilia With Shiva Tandava Stotram, Brazilian Samba Beats
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi received a grand welcome in Brasilia as he arrived for his State Visit to Brazil.

title: Mumbai Chartered Accountant Dies By Suicide Over Blackmail, Extortion
content: Raj Leela More consumed poison and left a three-page suicide note, blaming two people - who threatened to leak his private video - for his death.

title: Bees Delay Surat-Jaipur IndiGo Flight. Fliers Wait As Fire Engine Called In
content: In a bizarre incident, an IndiGo flight from Surat to Jaipur was delayed by over an hour as a swarm of bees sat near the aircraft's open luggage door

title: Dog's Bark Saves 67 Lives As Monsoon Wipes Out Village In Himachal's Mandi
content: As monsoon rains continue to batter Himachal Pradesh, triggering landslides, flash floods, and cloudbursts, a timely bark from a village dog in Mandi district raised alarm, enabling 67 people from 20 families to escape just in time.

title: "Not Targeted": China Downplays Allegation Of Backing Pak In Op Sindoor
content: Beijing on Monday downplayed India's assertion that China provided active military support to Pakistan during Operation Sindoor, using the conflict between two nuclear-armed neighbours as a "live lab" to test various weapon systems.

title: 2 Students Dead, Many Injured As School Van Hit By Train In Tamil Nadu
content: The school van collided with a Villupuram-Mayiladuthurai passenger train at a railway-level crossing in Tamil Nadu's Cuddalore.

title: Adani Power Completes 600MW Vidarbha Unit, Capacity Reaches 18,150 MW
content: Adani Power Ltd (APL) on Tuesday said it has successfully completed the acquisition and resolution plan implementation of Vidarbha Industries Power Ltd (VIPL) for Rs 4,000 crore.

title: Surat Jeweller Shot Dead During Robbery Attempt At His Store, 1 Arrested
content: Armed robbers shot dead a jeweller and injured another person while looting valuables from a jewellery showroom in Gujarat's Surat city, police said on Tuesday.

title: Heavy Rains Lash Kolkata, Waterlogging In Major Parts Of The City
content: Waterlogging was reported from several parts of Kolkata on Tuesday morning as heavy rains lashed southern West Bengal, officials said.

title: Thai Acting PM Wants 'Better Deal' Than Trump Threatened 36% Tariff
content: Thailand's acting prime minister Phumtham Wechayachai said Tuesday he wanted a "better deal" than the 36 percent tariff Donald Trump threatened to impose in a letter to the country.

title: Teen Lovers Found Dead In Delhi Under Suspicious Circumstances
content: A 16-year-old boy and a girl were found dead under suspicious circumstances at the girl's residence in Delhi's Najafgarh, an official said on Tuesday.

title: Indian Family Of 4, On Vacation In US, Burns To Death In Car Crash
content: The collision occurred in Green County when a mini-truck, reportedly traveling on the wrong side of the road, crashed head-on with their car.

title: A'ja Wilson, Josh Allen among 2025 ESPYS candidates; vote now
content: the 2025 ESPYS presented by Capital One are July 16 . the Oklahoma City Thunder guard is nominated in two categories: Best Athlete - Men's Sports, and Best NBA Player . Simone Biles and Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone are up for best . Ilona Maher and Ezra Frech represent in both categories .
